alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 25 at 3:55PM MST until August 25 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Gila County in east central Arizona... Southern Coconino County in north central Arizona... * Until 700 PM MST. * At 355 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain near Pine. Between 0.75 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Payson, East Verde Estates, Flowing Springs, Pine, Geronimo Estates and Tonto Natural Bridge State Park. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
